name: Super Gumi
description:
Super GUMI was made in Unity as part of the Women Game Jam in 2019.

It features a game about a little bear and their playful wa of seeing and solving their organizational problems and earn a well deserved pudding after dinner.

Animations and Programming: Anna Katharina Krause
Art and Level Design: Giulia Zielasko
Programming and Level Design: Magda Catiane de Castro
